item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! And thanks for checking me out :) Who am I? In my work life I work as a systemsadministrator for Aarhus University - my daily work is based around VMware solutions and systems. I have experience in: PowerShell VMware: vSphere ESX and vCenter and solutions like: VSAN, NSX, Horizon Windows Server: AD (+LDAP), Fileservers (+DFS), WDS and more. Linux: Mostly a Debian based user, working with all kinds of Linux based services.
